nio/SignalRate.Description: Pump in signals, see how fast you are pumping them in.
nio/SignalRate.Output:
-   **rate**: The rate per second of the incoming signals
-   **group**: The group that the counts relate to as defined by **group_by**.

averaging_interval.description: The interval over which to calculate frequencies.

report_interval.description: The interval at which to report frequencies.

group_by.description: The value by which signals are grouped. Output signals will have *group* set to this value.
